document_data.name: ''Umber Hulk Hide Breastplate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Umber hulk hide breastplate''''' was a type of [[medium armor]] crafted using [[umber hulk]] chitin and imbued with the creature's natural magic.
document_data.Powers: These breastplates were created through stacking together thick umber hulk plates and hide. They offered sturdy physical protection, similar to a ''+2'' [[enchantment]] and gave the wielder complete immunity to any mind-affecting abilities and spells.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''umber hulk hide breastplates'' were sold by a [[drow]] merchant who did business from the [[Undergate]], [[Westgate]]'s unsavory underbelly.
